content: skill level beginner/intermediate yarn medium weight cotton yarn lace 4 in green black and pink other materials polyester fiber filling hook sizes e/3 50 mm stitches used and abbreviations magic_ring magic_ring chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet bobble stitch bobble decrease decrease increase increase fasten_off f/o instructions - work in row join with a slip_stitch and ch1 at the end of each row otherwise instructed - the bobble stitch is a group of 7 double_crochet work each stitch to the last loop but leave the last loop on the hook while you are working the rest of the stitches in the bobble then yarn over and draw a loop through all the loops on the hook to complete the stitch
